wikipedia_page.main: John Alan Patrick Lodwick (2 March 1916 – 18 March 1959) was a British novelist.

response: *Contagion to This World by John Lodwick (III.ii)
*Bid the Soldiers Shoot by John Lodwick (V.ii)

Legge met John Lodwick at Orange in Vichy France on 13 January 1942 while Lodwick was working on his first novel, Running to Paradise, which he dedicated to her when it was published in 1943.  By 1945, Legge and Lodwick were living in Cornwall with their two children, with Legge working as a book collector.

De Polnay then spent several years traveling in Portugal and Spain, where he became friends with the novelist John Lodwick. He married Elaine Daphne Tasker in 1952 but the marriage ended in divorce less than two years later. In 1955 he married Maria del Carmen Rubio y Caparo, daughter of a Spanish theater director and the Spanish-Catalan actress Angela Rubio y Caparo.
